item.title: New Random Generators in Java 17
item.description: Java 17 introduced new random number generators. These provide longer cycles, improved statistical uniform distribution, improved threading support, and Streams API integration. This article provides a short introduction to random number generators and an overview of the improvements made in Java 17.
